hero.headline: Compatible/Replacement & Cost-effective Ready Products, One-stop Solution
hero.subheadline: Covering 315 / 433.92 / 446 / 447 / 868 / 915 MHz (versions provided by sales region), fixed code / rolling code / learning type (fixed code only). Typical open range 30-100 m (affected by indoor environment). Optional long-range solution: under compliant power and antenna configuration, open range can reach 1-3 km (see conditions). Support "compatible/replacement" and "configurable small batches".

keyPoints.0: CE / FCC / KC / RoHS (if applicable, certificates attached)

hero.promise: Work order number generated after submission; reply by email within [24] hours on working days

disclaimer.0: Range specifications are for open field conditions; indoor performance may vary
disclaimer.1: Long-range options (1-3km) require compliant power and antenna configurations
disclaimer.2: Learning type remotes only support fixed code protocols (EV1527/PT2262)
disclaimer.3: Rolling code compatibility depends on receiver support

video.title: 15s Factory Tour
video.caption: SMT | AOI | RF Test | Burn-in | Packing

footer.tagline: FastFun Remote — your trusted IoT partner since 2010. ISO-certified electronics manufacturing delivering precision smart devices with 98.7% FPY. 15 years experience, 47 NPI projects annually.

contact.address: 8F, Building 1, Huawei Ke Valley, Dalingshan Town, Dongguan, Guangdong, China
